    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:04.080
    | text      = Oh, that's good
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:04.639
    | text      = Putin has warned that any no-fly zone in any country entering militarily
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:08.879
    | text      = will be counted as an act of war and that the exact second, the very second that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = any nation joins in with Ukraine and attacking Russian forces
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:19.120
    | text      = that Russia will be at war with that country
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:26.960
    | text      = Germany has responded and said that Ukraine's NATO membership will not take place
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:32.320

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:36.000
    | text      = That's something that Putin was asking for before he launched this invasion
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:41.120
    | text      = So on the one hand, this is kind of a meaningless piece of news that Alex is covering
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:44.960
    | text      = But if you consider the point of what he's saying, you can kind of deduce a tone
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:48.960
    | text      = that will be verified as we go along
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:52.320
    | text      = Okay
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:52.879
    | text      = When I say this is meaningless, it's because these aren't news items and they're not unexpected
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:57.840
    | text      = Of course, Putin would say that putting in a no-fly zone over Ukraine
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:01.039
    | text      = to be considered by him to be an act of war
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:03.039
    | text      = and he would naturally threaten to be at war with any country that decides to put one in place
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:07.200
    | text      = That's not a novel position and it's not news really
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:09.759
    | text      = Well, I mean, the idea of setting up a no-fly zone would be
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:13.679
    | text      = if a Russian plane were to fly into the no-fly zone, it would be attacked by a brain
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:18.559
    | text      = So that would be an act of war
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:20.960
    | text      = Right
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:21.279
    | text      = It's very simple
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:22.080
    | text      = And it's not something that hasn't already been understood
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:25.600
    | text      = Yeah, everybody knows that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:26.559
    | text      = Prior to the invasion, when the invasion happened
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:28.879
    | text      = The whole thing, everybody was like, if we wanted to, we would have already done it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:32.080
    | text      = Right
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:32.320
    | text      = Yeah
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:32.639
    | text      = Simultaneously, it's also not news to say that Germany is commenting that Ukraine won't be put
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:37.679
    | text      = into NATO, but that needs to be understood in context
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:41.600
    | text      = Prior to the invasion, German chancellor Olof Schultz was saying that there was no plan to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:46.320
    | text      = bring Ukraine into the group and had very strong hands-off perspectives about sending aid
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:52.480
    | text      = In the lead-up to the invasion, they banned any other country from sending German-made
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:56.240
    | text      = weapons to help the Ukrainians and the extent of their support was just sending some helmets
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:00.879
    | text      = and five million dollars for a field hospital
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:03.759
    | text      = However, the invasion was a very serious turning point in terms of how Germany
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:08.480
    | text      = and Schultz's government in particular feels about their place in the greater scheme of European affairs
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:13.440
    | text      = After Putin invaded, Germany went back on their long-standing prohibition of providing lethal aid
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:18.559
    | text      = and sent anti-tank weapons and stinger defense systems to Ukraine, which honestly is a huge deal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:23.679
    | text      = Yeah
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:24.240
    | text      = Schultz gave a speech in front of the Bundestag on February 27th
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:27.840
    | text      = which signaled a complete change of policy in German international affairs
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:32.240
    | text      = Quote, fellow citizens, the 24th of February 2022 marks a watershed in the history of our continent
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:38.480
    | text      = With the attack on Ukraine, the Russian president Putin has started a war of aggression in Cold War
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:43.200
    | text      = and in Cold Blood
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:44.480
    | text      = Schultz clearly laid out the aggression on Ukraine as being a clear and immediate threat
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:48.720
    | text      = to the security of the whole of Europe and proposed a multi-pronged plan
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:52.799
    | text      = The first element was supporting Ukraine
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:54.799
    | text      = The second was an attempt to quote, divert Putin from the path of war
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:58.639
    | text      = largely by way of economic sanctions and embargoes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:01.919
    | text      = The third was stopping any possible sprawl in the war
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:04.639
    | text      = by unconditionally defending any NATO member country
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:07.679
    | text      = in particular by beefing up presence in countries like Romania and Lithuania
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:12.720
    | text      = The fourth was coming to terms with the fact that Putin is in fact intent on building a larger empire
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:18.159
    | text      = And the fifth was rethinking energy supplies
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:21.519
    | text      = This was a strong statement of participation in the isolation of Putin
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:25.919
    | text      = and the recognition of the need to support the people in Putin's path
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:29.759
    | text      = This is a far cry from the position coming from Schultz a mere week prior
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:33.360
    | text      = and that's notable because Germany was the main country along with Macron from France
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:38.720
    | text      = who were engaged in the peace talks with Putin prior to the invasion
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:42.799
    | text      = There's a real feeling here that this is someone who is deeply involved in the attempt to avert
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:47.360
    | text      = the invasion responding to that invasion with a change in tone from the previous status quo
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:52.559
    | text      = Which leads you to think maybe he knows something that isn't public
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:55.600
    | text      = It's almost as though in those negotiations he was under the impression that absolutely
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:02.000
    | text      = we would be able at the very least to have a good faith conversation about peace
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:06.799
    | text      = And he's probably figured out that that was never a part of the fucking game
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:10.720
    | text      = I've heard that suggested by folks and I think that's a very possible interpretation of these events
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:16.080
    | text      = Yeah
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:16.720
    | text      = So here's where the angle and Alex's commentary comes in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:20.240
    | text      = He's trying to paint a picture where the reality is that Putin is getting what he wanted out of the invasion
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:25.519
    | text      = He wanted Ukraine not to join NATO and here's Germany saying they weren't gonna join
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:30.080
    | text      = Wow
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:30.720
    | text      = But the issue is that Germany said that prior to the invasion very clearly
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:34.320
    | text      = Scholl said in a press conference which he gave along with Zelensky
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:38.159
    | text      = that quote the question of Ukraine membership in alliances is practically not on the agenda
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:43.679
    | text      = This isn't something that's been a change in tone
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:45.759
    | text      = It's been Germany's position as well as the position of some other European countries
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:49.600
    | text      = long before the invasion
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:51.600
    | text      = What Alex is doing is attempting to create the image of a victory for Putin
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:55.279
    | text      = but it's nothing of the sort
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:57.360
    | text      = Ukraine wasn't going to be joining NATO anytime soon
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:00.240
    | text      = even if their path toward membership was still on the table and a future possibility
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:04.720
    | text      = The notion that they were going to be joining and that it was a done deal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:08.799
    | text      = was part of Putin's justification for his invasion
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:11.360
    | text      = and Alex is essentially playing along with that entire framing of the situation
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:15.600
    | text      = Like Ukraine was going to go into NATO which Putin didn't want
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:18.240
    | text      = so he invaded now they're not going to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:20.240
    | text      = Right
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:20.879
    | text      = This is exactly the sort of thing you'd expect to hear from a committed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:23.919
    | text      = Putin fanboy apologist and propagandist
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:26.960
    | text      = Mm-hmm
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:27.840
    | text      = And here's the thing too given Germany's very foundational shift in in terms of sending weapons
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:34.080
    | text      = it may be the case that they rethink some other things too
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:36.559
    | text      = like the prospect of supporting Ukraine's bid to join NATO
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:39.679
    | text      = I'm not saying it's necessarily going to be the case
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:41.840
    | text      = but if anything it seems like this invasion could make that more likely
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:45.440
    | text      = Oh yeah
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:45.840
    | text      = as well as the possibility that people understand the need to protect other countries
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:49.840
    | text      = Oh I mean there's there's no doubt you know the invasion happened
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:53.600
    | text      = and more and more countries immediately were like let's join NATO
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:57.679
